Html:
Hello,

I'm using the graphviz functionality with nodes of type 'Record' with multiple cells in each node. When I declare an edge I want to connect from one specific cell on the first node to one specific cell on the second. Using graphviz straight-up this down via 'ports'.

I see where I can specify the port names for each cell but I do not see where I can specify the ports of the edge.

Can someone point in the direction where I can find this?

Thank you,
Joe

I don't maintain ngraphviz, which is the managed layer that generates the graphviz code. I haven't looked at it recently (in a long time), maybe it has a hook to emit custom text which could be a workaround.
